original_title: Red Vibe Diaries 3: The Garden of Transgression
overview: Stacy Valentine is back as Samantha, but not so innocent this time. She lures a young nave woman into the dark intrigues of high-class, daytime prostitution, filled with perverted sex, blackmail and treachery, with a blending of story and erotica as only acclaimed director James Avalon can do.
title: Red Vibe Diaries 3: The Garden of Transgression
